review: Love the fire TV.  My real only complain is voice search isn't available in the apps, but as a prime user I watch 90% of my tv on fire tv, and flip to netflix rarely.
author: foofooboy

review: This is the best thing I've bought in awhile
author: Nana Judy

review: Gift from a client!  I abso love it!  So easy to set upAnd to use!
author: Jennifer Perdue

review: Love it too bad everything comes with a fee
author: Aleja

review: We loved our kindle fire he so much we bought the fire tv and let me say WOW . Very responsive remote works like a charm. The voice feature actually works . Lots of content to choose from. Throw out your cable box save some coin buy a fire tv subscribe to prime get your self some NEtflix and your on your way to hours of entertainment
author: Kindle Customer

review: Love the user interface. It’s almost like they used normal people to test and design it. Things are where you would expect them to be. It’s logical. Very easy to use and setup. Great to enjoy.
author: Thea Lambert

review: Was gift for daughter and husband enjoy it very much
author: Teddy Knight

review: Bought it to use with Netflix. And netflix only works half the time.
author: Braden Bettis
